lines.text:
[goading Darren into sticking his neck under a guillotine blade]
COME ON... PUT YOUR HEAD IN THERE... DO IT
Murder or suicide, both will get you into the club.
I bet you're wondering just exactly who I am? Well I'm gonna show ya!
Either you conquer your fears or you face the consequences

[about to duel with John]
Where's mine?
Fuck that shit! You don't get one!

[When he discovers that he's alone in the mansion]
This had better be an INCREDIBLE practical joke!
You don't go to this school do you?
